mapper.sql: id, activity_id, state, create_time, finish_time, enterprise_id, activity_time, qr_code
mapper.insert: insert into orders (id, activity_id, state, create_time, finish_time, enterprise_id, activity_time, qr_code) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update orders
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activity_time = #{activityTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
qr_code = #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update orders set activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity_time = #{activityTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, qr_code = #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id from orders where activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and (state=1 or state=2)
select * from orders where activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and state=2
